statements: UPDATE WrestlerStatistics SET win_count = 10, loss_count = 5 WHERE wrestler_id = 1
UPDATE WrestlerStatistics SET finishing_moves = 'Chokeslam, Powerbomb', match_duration = '00:15:00' WHERE wrestler_id = 2
UPDATE WrestlerStatistics SET win_count = 10, loss_count = 5 WHERE wrestler_id = 123;
UPDATE WrestlerStatistics SET match_duration = '2 hours 30 minutes', finishing_moves = 'Suplex, Leg Drop' WHERE wrestler_name = 'Hulk Hogan';
UPDATE WrestlerMatches SET result = 'Win' WHERE wrestler_id = 1 AND opponent_id = 2;
UPDATE WrestlerDetails SET wrestler_height = 180, wrestler_birthdate = '1990-05-15' WHERE wrestler_id = 3;
UPDATE WrestlerMatches SET result='Win', match_duration=15 WHERE wrestler_id=1 AND opponent_id=2;
UPDATE WrestlerDetails SET wrestler_name='John Cena', wrestler_weight=250, wrestler_birthdate='1977-04-23' WHERE wrestler_id=5;
UPDATE wrestlers SET win_count = 10, loss_count = 5 WHERE wrestler_id = 1;
UPDATE match_statistics SET match_duration = '00:30:00' WHERE match_id = 2;
UPDATE wrestlers SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE wrestler_id = 1001;
UPDATE wrestlers SET wrestler_name = 'John Cena', win_count = 50, loss_count = 10 WHERE wrestler_id = 1002;
UPDATE wrestler_stats SET win_count = win_count + 1 WHERE wrestler_id = 1;
UPDATE match_stats SET duration = '00:15:30' WHERE match_id = 5;
UPDATE wrestler_stats SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE wrestler_id = 101;
UPDATE match_stats SET duration = '00:30:00', date = '2022-06-15' WHERE match_id = 201;
UPDATE wrestler SET weight_class = 'Heavyweight' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE finishers SET description = 'Signature move of the wrestler' WHERE wrestler_id = 3;
UPDATE wrestler SET name='John Cena', height=6.2, birthdate='1977-04-23' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE finishers SET finisher_name='Stone Cold Stunner', description='A devastating finishing move involving a standing opponent' WHERE wrestler_id=3;
